question: What are the key industry trends identified by leadership teams at companies that have published prominent YouTube content related to technology adoption?

subtasks.task: Identify companies with prominent YouTube content about tech adoption. [CompanyYoutubeDetail]
Extract leadership excerpts from those companies. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Analyze excerpts to identify key industry trends. [IndustryITTrend, CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
